content: to crochet my greylag goose you ll need to be happy with a little sewing as well as taking on the basic crocheting techniques but it works up quickly and i ll provide all the information even a complete crochet beginner will need the majority of the pattern is made using the 3 75mm crochet hook and variegated gray yarn your smaller crochet hook is for the surface single crocheting that you ll be doing to give the amigurumi goose s wings definition 50g sirdar snuggly dk yarn in tangerine twist 50g stylecraft batik dk yarn in graphite 3 75mm crochet hook 2 25mm crochet hook toy safe stuffing safety eyes steel yarn needle i ve noted the yarn i used in case you want to get the same but any dk variety should be fine for this pattern find the full pattern for free on lucy kate crochet
